Communicate your decisions using the following action protocols:

  '[Fold]'   - abandon your current hand
  '[Bet N]'  - place an opening bet of N chips
  '[Raise N]'- escalate the betting by N chips

Invalid actions will result in retries. Use exact bracket format and ensure you have sufficient chips for bets/raises. Check when facing a bet is invalid.
